conbody.p: toolbarThe toolbar can be used for quick access to many frequently used functions of Dialog Nibelung. The toolbar panel is located along the left side of the main teacher module window (_fixme_ xref fig.36).
The toolbar panel can be customize individually for every teacher.
Select ViewToolbar settings from the main menu to set up the toolbar. A Customize toolbar window ( ) will appear on your screen.
Elements of the Customize toolbar window:

row.entry: Move item up the list button
Move item down the list button

conbody.p:

save class file as... _fixme_ xref

Select an item from the list of Available actions _fixme_ [ui] on the left and press the Move action to selected button (3 in ) to move it to the list of actions that appear in the toolbar. You can rearrange the items in the selected actions list by using buttons 6 and 7 in . You can also insert a separator onto the list to organize toolbar actions into logical groups.
conbody.note: Don't forget to make the toolbar visible by selecting ViewToolbar from the menu.
